title: Looking for support player p5 plus
body:
Hey guys, just starting up another thread looking for a plat plus support player who can communicate well and efficiently in a team environment without being super toxic and who also has a wide champion pool! who is also willing to play 3/4 times a week of practice thanks for all responses in advance


IGN- The J0ker

replies.body: Hello, i am a challenger support main that has recently reformed from my old ways, here is my op.gg http://www.op.gg/summoner/userName=hideonbush, if you'd like to further discuss my position and champion pool (which as big as a guy's !@*# in a blacked.com video) please contact me at Reformed_Xandoor@gmail.com, have a good day sir
